item.title: BREAKING NEWS: Drew Barrymore's half-sister 'found dead in her car' in California
item.description: {"title":"Drew Barrymore's half-sister Jessica found dead in California","summary":["Jessica Barrymore, 47, was found dead in her car in National City, just north of San Diego, on Tuesday.","Jessica Barrymore, 47, was found dead in her car yesterday from a suspected suicide Marta Lopez made the discovery when she tried to leave for work but was blocked in her driveway by Ms Barrymore's car, 10News reported.","She unsuccessfully tried to wake Ms Barrymore, who was to turn 48 tomorrow, before calling the police."],"source":"dailymail.co.uk"}

item.title: Orlando Bloom threw a punch at Justin Bieber at Spanish hotspot, report says
item.description: {"title":"Orlando Bloom threw a punch at Justin Bieber at Spanish hotspot, report says","summary":["After getting in each other\u00e2\u0080\u0099s faces\u00e2\u0080\u0094Bloom threw a punch at the pop star\u00e2\u0080\u0094the crowd cheered.","The bad blood between the two began in 2012 when Bieber was seen getting flirty with Kerr, which reportedly led to tension between the model and her then-husband, Bloom.","Then newly single Bloom was seen spending time with Bieber\u00e2\u0080\u0099s ex-girlfriend, Selena Gomez, in April."],"source":"foxnews.com"}

item.title: Ariana Grande Opens Up About Her Confidence Problem
item.description: {"title":"Ariana Grande Opens Up About Her Confidence Problem","summary":[" She's the vocal powerhouse behind what is shaping up to be the song of the summer, but even Ariana Grande hasn't always felt confident.","Grande says she found strength in her grandfather, who died last week.","However, she also names the estrangement with her father as the toughest thing she's had to deal with to date."],"source":"people.com"}

item.title: On the road again: Echo and the Bunnymen hop the pond
item.description: {"title":"Echo and the Bunnymen hop the pond","summary":["It is hard sometimes to go, no, we're not playing this.","When they got it started again, they played one song continuously for 20 minutes because they couldn't figure out how to turn the thing off.","They just stand there, while this fella struggles with this box?"],"source":"usatoday.com"}
